titleStmt.title: Renowned Robin Hood. Or, His famous archery truly related, with the worthy exploits he acted before Queen Katherine, he being an outlaw-man, and how she for the same obtained of the king, his own, and his fellows pardon. To a new tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and I. Wright.,

notesStmt.note: Right half-sheet contains: The second part, to the same tune.
Date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
